name: Everything is Fire
description:
This was made as part of the BlackThornProd Shooter Udemy Course, I had lots of fun making it and the music is by Gerald Chitsunge. 

You were having a nice picnic in the forest when a forest fire started, the fire brigade showed up but instead of putting water on they accidentally put oil on, you are mostly on fire and you must keep a tiny put of you cool so you don't burn up, try to put out the rest of the forest os well while you are at it.
